mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_Test ( testId , testNm , seq , insId , insDt , uptId , uptDt ) VALUES ( nextval(Test_TestId) , #{testNm} , #{seq} , #{insId} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , null , null )
mapper.select: SELECT testId , testNm , seq FROM TB_Test WHERE TestId = #{testId}
SELECT A.testId , A.testNm , A.seq , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_QuestPage WHERE testId = A.testId) as questPageCnt FROM TB_Test A ORDER BY Seq
SELECT testId , questPageId , questPageNm , questPageSeq , questPageType FROM TB_QuestPage WHERE TestId = #{testId} AND QuestPageId = #{questPageId}

SELECT A.testId , A.questPageId , A.questPageNm , A.questPageSeq , A.questPageType , fnGetCdNm(A.questPageType) AS questPageTypeNm FROM TB_QuestPage A WHERE A.testId = #{testId} ORDER BY A.questPageSeq
SELECT A.questType , A.questAttrCd , A.questAttrNm , A.totScore , A.cutLine , A.seq , fnGetCdNm(A.questType) AS questTypeNm FROM TB_QuestAttr A ORDER BY A.questType, A.seq

SELECT A.testId , A.questPageId , A.questId , A.questNo , A.questCont1 , A.questCont2 , A.questCont3 , A.questType , A.questAttrCd1 , A.questAttrCd2 , A.waitSec , A.itemColCnt , A.imgColCnt , A.useYn , fnGetCdNm(questType) AS questTypeNm , fnGetQuestAttrNm(questAttrCd1) AS questAttrCd1Nm , fnGetQuestAttrNm(questAttrCd2) AS questAttrCd2Nm , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_QuestItem WHERE QuestId = A.QuestId) AS itemCnt , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_QuestImg WHERE QuestId = A.QuestId) AS imgCnt FROM TB_Quest A WHERE A.TestId = #{testId} AND A.QuestPageId = #{questPageId}

SELECT testId , questPageId , questId , questNo , questCont1 , questCont2 , questCont3 , questType , questAttrCd1 , questAttrCd2 , waitSec , itemColCnt , imgColCnt , useYn FROM TB_Quest WHERE TestId = #{testId} AND QuestPageId = #{questPageId} AND QuestId = #{questId}
SELECT questId , itemId , itemType , conts , imgNm , seq , weigt FROM TB_QuestItem WHERE QuestId = #{questId} AND ItemId = #{itemId}
SELECT questId , itemId , itemType , conts , imgNm , seq , weigt FROM TB_QuestItem WHERE QuestId = #{questId} ORDER BY seq

SELECT questId , itemId , itemType , conts , imgNm , seq , weigt FROM TB_QuestItem WHERE QuestId IN (SELECT QuestId FROM Tb_Quest WHERE TestId = #{testId} AND QuestPageId = #{questPageId}) ORDER BY questId, seq
SELECT questId , imgId , imgType , conts , imgNm , seq FROM TB_QuestImg WHERE QuestId = #{questId} AND ItemId = #{imgId}
SELECT questId , imgId , imgType , conts , imgNm , seq FROM TB_QuestImg WHERE QuestId = #{questId} ORDER BY seq
SELECT questId , imgId , imgType , conts , imgNm , seq FROM TB_QuestImg WHERE QuestId IN (SELECT QuestId FROM Tb_Quest WHERE TestId = #{testId} AND QuestPageId = #{questPageId}) ORDER BY questId, seq
